user_query: should tell dad not until we know what's going on oh my god surprise does mom know no i hope not oh it's got a handle of course it's got a handle it's how big you got i know right mom's out back okay good can you check out some flights dad what are you doing here what do you mean what am i doing here i'm gonna go to you you crazy man did you check with the doctor i checked with the doctor jeff home no not yet let me find out when he's coming back jack got better fast definitely it was a 24-hour thing no i like the house but you've seen pictures not the real thing why don't you take grandpa outside show him uh your golf where are you hitting it that flag over there my record's three three i'll believe that when i see it come on let's go whoa not bad beat that i'll beat that husband oh christ yes chinese food would be fine no of course not your mother says you're at the top of your class you have to work hard at school i'll tell you what i used to tell your mother when she was your age yeah she warned me about that one you don't know how to use chopsticks yeah i can use them you like making fun of me don't you yeah you're funny that's my fork a regular fork dropping this hole down my shirt can you pass down the chili sauce please no i don't i don't really want it it's fine i don't need it if he changes his mind he knows where it is he can get it himself i'm sorry dad oh that's okay so what are your plans stay a day or two head on out to see robert surprise him on his tour this

entities.entity_description: 가족을 방문하러 온 아버지/할아버지 캐릭터로, 의사와 상담 후 여행을 왔으며 로버트를 만나러 갈 계획이 있다
투어 중인 캐릭터로, 아버지가 깜짝 방문할 계획인 인물
학교에서 우수한 성적을 받고 있으며, 골프를 치고 할아버지를 놀리는 것을 좋아하는 어린 캐릭터

relationships.relationship_description: 아버지는 로버트를 투어 중에 깜짝 방문할 계획이다
할아버지와 손녀/손자 관계로, 함께 골프를 치고 중국 음식을 먹으며 시간을 보낸다
어머니는 자녀가 학교에서 우수한 성적을 받고 있다고 말한다
